achievements.name: TROPHY_PLATINUM
achievements.description: You have unlocked all achievements!

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_01
achievements.description: Completed "The Man with the Guardian Spirit".

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_02
achievements.description: Completed "Deep in the Shadows."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_03
achievements.description: Completed "The Ocean Roars Again."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_04
achievements.description: Completed "The Demon of Mount Hiei."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_05_A
achievements.description: Met with Tokugawa Ieyasu.

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_05_B
achievements.description: Witnessed Tokugawa's forces head toward a decisive battle.

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_06
achievements.description: Completed "The Source of Evil."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_07_A
achievements.description: Completed "The Samurai from Sawayama."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_07_B
achievements.description: Completed "The Demon King Revealed."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_08
achievements.description: Completed "The Queen's Eyes."

achievements.name: TROPHY_MISSION_JAPAN_2ND
achievements.description: Made two circuits around Japan.

achievements.name: TROPHY_ACHIEVE_LEVEL_A
achievements.description: Reached level 10.

achievements.name: TROPHY_ACHIEVE_LEVEL_B
achievements.description: Reached level 100.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILLFULLNESS_MAX
achievements.description: Reached maximum proficiency with your first weapon.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_KATANA
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the sword.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_NITOU
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the dual swords.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_YARI
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the spear.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_ONO
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the axe.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_KAMA
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the kusarigama.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_NIN
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for Ninjutsu.

achievements.name: TROPHY_SKILL_HIDDEN_ONMYOU
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for Onmyo Magic.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_COPY
achievements.description: Used a disguise.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_BARBER
achievements.description: Changed your hair style or beard.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_MODELCHANGE
achievements.description: Changed the appearance of an item.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_FORGING
achievements.description: Forged an item.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIND_MURAMASA
achievements.description: Found Muramasa and brought him in.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_FORGING
achievements.description: Made a total of 60 requests at the blacksmith.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_MATERIAL
achievements.description: Collected all the best materials.

achievements.name: TROPHY_ACHIEVE_COOP
achievements.description: Completed 10 missions with NPC or in the Yokai Realm with a companion with other users.

achievements.name: TROPHY_ACHIEVE_GESTURE
achievements.description: Communicated with a yokai 10 times.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_CHAOS
achievements.description: Confused an enemy for the first time.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_OUMA
achievements.description: Completed your first Twilight mission.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_SPA
achievements.description: Bathed in first hot spring.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_SACRED
achievements.description: Obtained first divine item.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_ENEMY
achievements.description: Defeated all types of yokai.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_SPA
achievements.description: Bathed in every hot spring from the Kyushu Region to the Omi Region.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_GESTURE
achievements.description: Acquired 40 gestures.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_KODAMA
achievements.description: Collected all Kodama from the Kyushu Region to the Omi Region.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_GUARDIAN
achievements.description: Collected all Guardian Spirits.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_KUSO
achievements.description: Became Ryunoshin the dung lover's best friend.

achievements.name: TROPHY_FIRST_HYOTTOKO
achievements.description: Used the mask of an ugly fellow to defeat an enemy.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_BONFIRE
achievements.description: Lit all three evil-warding bonfires in Itsukushima.

achievements.name: TROPHY_COMPLETE_HIRAGUMO
achievements.description: Collected all fragments of the Hiragumo teakettle from Shigisan.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DEFEAT_NUE
achievements.description: Defeated the Nue of Mount Hiei.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DEFEAT_DELIC_Z
achievements.description: Defeated Derrick the Executioner.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_MISSION_01
achievements.description: Completed "Yokai Country."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_MISSION_02
achievements.description: Completed "The One-Eyed Dragon's Castle."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_MISSION_03
achievements.description: Completed "Spirit Stone Huntress."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_COMPLETE_KODAMA
achievements.description: Collected all Kodama in the Tohoku region.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_HIDDEN_ODACHI
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the odachi.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_MASTER_SACRED
achievements.description: Equipped +15 divine equipment in all slots. (Excludes accessories.)

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_COMPLETE_SPA
achievements.description: Bathed in every hot spring in the Tohoku region.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_WOMEN_MODELCHANGE
achievements.description: Completed any mission while transformed into a woman.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_MISSION_SUB157
achievements.description: Completed "Hands of the Dragon."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_COMPLETE_AOBA
achievements.description: Seized all of Aoba Castle's three-storied keeps in "The One-Eyed Dragon's Castle."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC1_WAIT_SHIGENAGA
achievements.description: Listened to Katakura Shigenaga's entire introduction in "The One-Eyed Dragon's Castle."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_MISSION_01
achievements.description: Completed the mission "The Siege of Osaka (Winter)."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_MISSION_02
achievements.description: Completed "Scion of Virtue."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_COMPLETE_KODAMA
achievements.description: Collected all Kodama in the "Siege of Osaka (Winter)" chapter.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_HIDDEN_TONFA
achievements.description: Acquired mystic art for the tonfa.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_COMPLETE_SPA
achievements.description: Bathed in every hot spring in the "Siege of Osaka (Winter)" chapter.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_ONLY_TONFA
achievements.description: Defeated Sarutobi Sasuke in the mission "The Siege of Osaka (Winter)" using only tonfa. (Cannot use a Visitor/Companion.)

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_ONLY_WOODEN_NITOU
achievements.description: Defeated Ganryu's Sasaki Kojiro using only Dual Wooden Swords. (Cannot use a Visitor/Companion.)

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_SHOOT_ALL_CULVERIN
achievements.description: Used all the culverins in the mission "The Siege of Osaka (Winter)."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_DEFEAT_10_WARRIOR
achievements.description: Defeated all of Sanada's Ten Braves in "Scion of Virtue."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_MISSION_SUB163
achievements.description: Completed "The Sparrow Flies Again."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC2_THREE_SACRED_GOODS
achievements.description: Equipped the Kusanagi Tsurugi, Yasakani Magatama, and Yata Mirror.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_CH11_MAIN01
achievements.description: Completed "The Sanada's Resolve."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_CH11_MAIN02
achievements.description: Completed "Resentment Unleashed."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_CH11_MAIN03
achievements.description: Completed "The Last Samurai."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_COMPLETE_SPA
achievements.description: Bathed in every hot spring in the "Siege of Osaka (Summer)" chapter.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_COMPLETE_KODAMA
achievements.description: Collected all Kodama in the "Siege of Osaka (Summer)" chapter.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_MISSION_SUB169
achievements.description: Completed "The Grand Tournament" on Way of the Strong or higher.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_MISSION_SUB168
achievements.description: Completed "The Master Ninja" on Way of the Strong or higher.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_MUGEN_CLEARED_SYURA
achievements.description: Completed the 20th plane in The Abyss.

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_BREAK_ALL_CANNON
achievements.description: Destroyed all the destructible cannons in "The Sanada's Resolve."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_ONMORAKI_ESCAPE
achievements.description: Defeated the Onmoraki during "Resentment Unleashed."

achievements.name: TROPHY_DLC3_BREAK_ALL_RENKINPOD
achievements.description: Destroyed all the Revenant contraptions on "The Last Samurai."
